Package com.example.librarian_module.sys

Class BookEdition

java.lang.Object
com.example.librarian_module.sys.BookEdition
public class BookEdition extends Object
The class BookEdition manages different editions of the books in the library system.
Since:
2022-03-04

  • Constructor Details

    • BookEdition

      public BookEdition()
      Create an empty BookEdition object.

    • BookEdition

      public BookEdition(String bid, String ed, String ISBN, String yr, String pgs, String cps)
      Create a BookEdition object with the specified parameters. It generates an array list of book copies based on the number of copies passed in.
      Parameters:
      bid - ID used as the key of the book.
      ed - An integer representing the edition of the book.
      ISBN - International Standard Book Number of the book.
      yr - Published year of the book.
      pgs - Number of pages of the book.
      cps - Number of copies of the book.

  • Method Details

    • issue

      public Item.StatusCode issue(String bwrid)
      Issue this edition of a book to the borrower with specified ID.
      Parameters:
      bwrid - ID of the borrower.
      Returns:
      An enum StatusCode representing the result of the issue book operation.

    • returnBack

      public Item.StatusCode returnBack(String bwrid)
      Return this edition of a book from the borrower with specified ID.
      Parameters:
      bwrid - ID of the borrower.
      Returns:
      An enum StatusCode representing the result of the return book operation.

    • findEdition

      public static int findEdition(ArrayList<BookEdition> eds, String ed)
      Find the index of this edition of a book in the editions array list of the book.
      Parameters:
      eds - Array list that holds all editions of a book.
      ed - An integer that holds the edition of the book.
      Returns:
      An integer representing the index of this edition of a book.

    • getFields

      public String getFields()
      Get the data of this edition of a book. Data fields are separated by "|".
      Returns:
      A string containing the data of this edition of a book.

    • addCopy

      public void addCopy(String bid, String ed, int cid, boolean stat, LocalDate begin, LocalDate due, String bwrid)
      Add the book copy to the book copies array list of the book edition of a book.
      Parameters:
      bid - ID used as the key of the book.
      ed - An integer representing the edition of the book.
      cid - Copy ID of this copy of the book.
      stat - Login status of this copy of the book.
      begin - Sign out date of the book.
      due - Due day of the book.
      bwrid - ID of the borrower of the book.
